alert.note: Alert for Logan; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 4:50PM CDT until July 10 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOGAN AND SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS COUNTIES... At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles south of Thedford, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 125 and 141. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
